ayah: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
ayah_translit: iq'tarabati al-sa'atu wa-inshaqqa al-qamaru
ayah_english: Has come near the Hour and has split the moon

ayah_translit: khusha'an absaruhum yakhrujuna mina al-ajdathi ka-annahum jaradun muntashirun

ayah: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
ayah_translit: faqalu abasharan minna wahidan nattabi'uhu inna idhan lafi dalalin wasu'urin

ayah_translit: a-ul'qiya al-dhik'ru alayhi min baynina bal huwa kadhabun ashirun

ayah: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ

ayah_english: And certainly he warned them (of) Our seizure but they disputed the warnings

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
ayah_translit: walaqad andharahum batshatana fatamaraw bil-nudhuri
ayah_english: And certainly he warned them (of) Our seizure but they disputed the warnings

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
ayah_translit: walaqad rawaduhu an dayfihi fatamasna a'yunahum fadhuqu adhabi wanudhuri
ayah_english: And certainly they demanded from him they demanded from him his guests so We blinded their eyes So taste My punishment and My warnings
